mapper.select: SELECT customer_id as id, customer_password as pwd, customer_name as name, customer_address as address, customer_contact as contact, customer_email as email, customer_grade as grade FROM TB_SSM_customer WHERE customer_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT TB_SSM_customer(customer_id as id, customer_password as password, customer_name as name, customer_address as address, customer_contact as contact, customer_email as email, customer_grade as grade) VALUES (#{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{address}, #{contact}, #{email}, #{grade})
